snippet.title: Pax Nova - Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
A first look at Pax Nova Gameplay. Coming to Steam Early Access on May 9.
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/804850/

Pax Nova is a sci-fi turn-based 4X strategy game where you lead the fate of one of several factions divided between three races. Explore new worlds and new star systems filled with exciting secrets as well as new dangers. Build new cities, expand your influence and fight great battles on land and in space.

Follow Pax Nova on all social platforms:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/paxnovagame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GamesByGreyWolf  / http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/paxnova
Official website: http://www.greywolf-entertainment.com/
